item.author: jb-compose-bot

item.description:
26 Jun 14:58
jb-compose-bot
v1.4.1
113e0f4
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.4.1 Latest
Latest

Common

Fixes

  • Fix perspective transform usage
  • After each ComposeScene.render phase, send apply notifications and perform the corresponding changes
  • Fix awaitDragStartOnSlop to detect slop-passing on both axes

Desktop

Fixes

  • Fix DesktopDropdownMenuPositionProvider to align with the correct horizontal side of the window
  • Propagate LocalLayoutDirection into PopupLayout
  • Fix missing scrolling events
  • Make popups accessible on desktop

Dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.4.4
  • Runtime 1.4.3
  • UI 1.4.3
  • Foundation 1.4.3
  • Material 1.4.3
  • Material3 1.0.1
Assets 2

v1.4.1-rc01
343e85f
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.4.1-rc01 Pre-release
Pre-release

Common

Fixes

  • Fix perspective transform usage
  • After each ComposeScene.render phase, send apply notifications and perform the corresponding changes
  • Fix awaitDragStartOnSlop to detect slop-passing on both axes

Desktop

Fixes

  • Fix DesktopDropdownMenuPositionProvider to align with the correct horizontal side of the window
  • Propagate LocalLayoutDirection into PopupLayout
  • Fix missing scrolling events
  • Make popups accessible on desktop

Dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.4.4
  • Runtime 1.4.3
  • UI 1.4.3
  • Foundation 1.4.3
  • Material 1.4.3
  • Material3 1.0.1
Assets 2
